title: Boardwalk Reign
description:
My kings are at war… and I’m at the center of the drama.
It turns out there are things about myself I didn’t know.Secrets that have changed the game for us.Falling for four ruthless men hasn’t been easy. Not with rival Mafia families trying to wipe us off the map and our allies working against us.But we’re stronger together.My kings say I can end this war.Because only a queen can unite a kingdom.Boardwalk Reign is the third and final book in the Boardwalk Mafia series and ends with a HEA.
author: Jillian Frost
